phq9.title: PHQ-9 Depression Screening
phq9.q1: Little interest or pleasure in doing things
phq9.q3: Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much
phq9.q4: Feeling tired or having little energy
phq9.q6: Feeling bad about yourself — or that you are a failure
phq9.q8: Moving or speaking so slowly that others noticed, or being fidgety/restless
phq9.q9: Thoughts that you would be better off dead, or of hurting yourself

gad7.title: GAD-7 Anxiety Screening
gad7.q1: Feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge
gad7.q2: Not being able to stop or control worrying
gad7.q3: Worrying too much about different things
gad7.q5: Being so restless that it's hard to sit still
gad7.q7: Feeling afraid as if something awful might happen

treatmentResponseChart.title: Treatment Response
treatmentResponseChart.noData: Not enough data to display treatment response

riskFactorsOpts.2: >=3 risk factors or history of atherosclerosis

nyha.title: NYHA Functional Classification
nyha.classIDesc: No limitation of physical activity. Ordinary physical activity does not cause symptoms.
nyha.classIIDesc: Slight limitation. Comfortable at rest, ordinary activity causes fatigue, palpitation, or dyspnea.
nyha.classIIIDesc: Marked limitation. Comfortable at rest, less than ordinary activity causes symptoms.
nyha.classIVDesc: Severe limitation. Symptoms at rest. Any physical activity increases discomfort.

items.pushesUpOnArms: Pushes up on arms when on tummy

items.exploresContainers: Puts objects in and out of containers
items.saysThreeWords: Says at least 3 words besides mama/dada
items.pointsToBodyParts: Points to body parts when named
items.turnsPages: Turns book pages one at a time
items.jumpsInPlace: Jumps in place with both feet
items.expressesEmotions: Expresses a wide range of emotions
items.drawsPerson: Draws a person with 2-4 body parts
items.balancesOneFoot: Balances on one foot for 10 seconds

abcde.title: ABCDE Melanoma Assessment
abcde.description: Score each criterion 0-2 to assess melanoma risk

recommendations.low: Low risk. Continue routine skin checks. Monitor for any changes.
recommendations.moderate: Moderate risk. Recommend close monitoring with follow-up in 3 months. Consider dermoscopic photography.
recommendations.high: High risk. Biopsy strongly recommended. Refer for dermatopathology evaluation.

evolution.title: Lesion Evolution
evolution.noHistoryDescription: No previous dermatology records found for this patient. Lesion evolution tracking will begin after this visit.
evolution.noMatchingLesions: No matching lesions found in past visits
evolution.noChanges: No changes detected since last visit
